name: Sumo Leap
description:
Sumo Leap is a game that imagines "what if sumo wrestlers could only leap?" It's created for the GitHub Game Off 2019 by Shoe Fisher Games. Add the natural bounds of sumo wresting in the mix and the Game Off 2019 theme of "Leaps and Bounds" is met!

If you like this game, let us know by rating it, commenting on it, or by following us on Twitter or Facebook. If we get lots of positive feedback we might continue to make this a fully featured couch coop game, where we would head in the direction of

  • More characters
  • More arenas
  • More game modes
  • Enhanced controls
  • Powerups in dangerous places
  • Smarter AI
  • Couch coop

Nico and Gertjan form Shoe Fisher Games, we are indie developers from the Netherlands who create a little game called WanderOut in our spare time.

Licensed under the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0. You can find the GitHub repository at https://github.com/shoefishergames/sumo-leap. Created using the excellent Godot engine.
